name: loyalty
content:

B2 [ U ] the quality of being loyal: His loyalty was never in question. Her loyalty to the cause is impressive. loyalties [ plural ]
your feelings of support or duty towards someone or something: My loyalties to my family come before anything else.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesThe unions assured the new owners of the workers' loyalty to the company.Medieval knights took an oath of loyalty to their lord.He prides himself on his loyalty to his friends.All the countries have proclaimed their loyalty to the alliance.Her loyalty is beyond question .
